description:
T0941 Acacia - Pollard at 8m in height
T4025 Robinia - Pollard at 8m. Current Height 14m reducing by 6m. Dominant to West towards building with significant overhang to garden. Water pocket at bifurcation at 2m.
T0951 1x Sycamore and 1x Lilac - Fell, squirrel damage. Trees in poor form.
T0940 Robinia - Pollard at 6m in height
T4028 Robinia - Pollard at 8m. Current height 14m, reducing by 6m. Dominant with minor stem lean to East over adjacent property. Partially occluded stem cavity West aspect at 1m. 
T0939 Robinia - Pollard at 8m. Current height 14m, reducing by 6m. Dominant to East over adjacent property. Historic partially occluded abscission wounds visible in upper stem and crown with areas of potential decay and weak points. Condition to be monitored 
T4029 Robinia - Pollard at 8m. Current height 15m, reducing by 7m. Major deadwood throughout crown and overhangs adjacent property 
T0941 Group - Fell, tree in poor form.
T4030 Robinia - Pollard at 8m. Current height 15m, reducing by 7m. Reduced in past. Habitat holes with potential cavities at 3m and 5m.
decision_conditions: The applicant's attention is drawn to Section 78 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990, by which an appeal may be made to the Secretary of State within 28 days of notification of this decision.
